last_episode_to_air.name: Obstacle, Of Course
last_episode_to_air.overview: Spidey arrives in Wakanda for Black Panther's birthday party which turns out to be a very dangerous obstacle course set up by Black Panther's sister, Shuri. The royal siblings are always competitive but they may have gone a little too far.

episodes.name: One Big Mess
episodes.overview: When Ultron steals Tony Stark's brand-new, high-tech garbage truck, Iron Man shows Spidey how to use problem-solving skills and inventiveness to stop the ravaging robot and clean up the city.

episodes.name: Uh Oh, It's Magic!
episodes.overview: Thor and Spidey enjoy a summer day at the pier until everyone's fun is frozen over by the evil Loki. While our heroes try to break the icy spell, Thor reminds Spidey to always look out for the little guy.

episodes.name: That Drone Cat
episodes.overview: After an intense battle with Doc Ock, Spidey and his pal Miles Morales accidentally scare a cat named Mittens, sending her scampering into the city. As our heroes desperately try to catch the runaway feline, Miles teaches Spidey to learn from his mistakes.

episodes.name: Rock and Roll
episodes.overview: When Spidey and Ant-Man try to rescue people off a collapsing bridge, Hulk decides to pitch in but his "smashing" makes things worse. In order to save everyone, all three heroes discover the importance of self-control and thinking before you act.

episodes.name: Electric Youth
episodes.overview: When Spidey and Ms. Marvel both show up to stop a bank robbery, they have to put aside their differences and work together to take down the evil Electro.

episodes.name: The Toys Are Back In Town
episodes.overview: Spidey teams up with the famous Captain America to track down a toy thief known as the Tinkerer. As our heroes rescue the stolen toys, Captain America reminds Spider-Man that being a hero means doing the right thing, no matter what.

episodes.name: Way Outer Space
episodes.overview: When a manned space shuttle malfunctions, Spider-Man, with the help of Captain Marvel, has to overcome his fear of space and try something new to save the astronauts on board.

episodes.name: Family Friendly
episodes.overview: When Absorbing Man destroys a bridge, separating kids from their parents, Spider-Man teams with Black Panther and is reminded that there's nothing more important than family.

episodes.name: Stomp and Listen
episodes.overview: Spidey joins forces with Wasp to stop the rampaging Rhino and soon learns that the best way to get what you want is to speak clearly and stand up for yourself.

episodes.name: Are You Sure? I'm Positive!
episodes.overview: During a frustrating chase to stop Stegron from destroying a museum, Spider-Man gets a boost from his pal Reptil, who teaches him the power of positive thinking.

episodes.name: Evil Mittens
episodes.overview: Ant-Man and The Wasp arrive for what seems like an easy task: Help Mittens out of a tree. When Ant-Man rushes into action before thinking, our tiny heroes, along with Spidey, are faced with a much larger problem.

episodes.name: Dr. Octopus's Garden
episodes.overview: Spider-Man and Ghost-Spider are led by Doctor Octopus on a frustrating chase through the museum. As Doc Ock eludes them over and over again, Ghost-Spider helps Spidey channel his frustration into coming up with a solution.

episodes.name: Mine!
episodes.overview: Spidey runs into Iron Man, who's invented a special tool to stop the rampaging Rhino. When Spidey uses the invention without asking permission first, he makes the situation much worse.

episodes.name: Now That's Funny!
episodes.overview: Black Panther arrives in New York with a brand-new, Vibranium rescue vehicle, only to have the vehicle hijacked by Ultron. In their attempt to stop the mechanical menace, Spidey reminds Black Panther that humor can be an effective tool for a super hero.

episodes.name: Listen
episodes.overview: Spider-Man, in an attempt to catch Green Goblin, accidentally loses Captain America's shield and is reminded that being a better listener is part of becoming a better super hero.

episodes.name: Sticky Mittens
episodes.overview: All of the bees in New York go missing, and that's bad news for the whole environment. Ms. Marvel and Spidey are on the case, which forces them to think outside of the box.

episodes.name: Cloudy With A Chance of Smiles
episodes.overview: After Spider-Man gets taken over by the evil Symbiote Venom, Hulk has to control his emotions in order to save Spidey and all of New York.

episodes.name: That's Why They Make Chocolate and Vanilla
episodes.overview: Spider-Girl and Spider-Man visit the ice cream shop after a long day, only to find out that someone's melting all of the ice cream in town. The spider-heroes disagree on how to capture the villain but learn that disagreeing is okay.

episodes.name: It's An Alien!
episodes.overview: Spidey and Captain Marvel investigate an alien threat but discover that intergalactic looks can be deceiving.

episodes.name: You Go High, I'll Go Low
episodes.overview: Spidey accidentally collides with fellow flyer - Falcon. They're both after Hobgoblin, but Spidey and Falcon realize that even the most awesome airborne heroes have to take turns.

episodes.name: Sorry Seems To Be The Hardest Word
episodes.overview: Spidey and Black Panther have an unfortunate run-in with Nebula, which leads to unfair accusations by both our heroes and the infamous space pirate. Even in an intergalactic traffic accident, an apology goes a long way.

episodes.name: The Claws of Life
episodes.overview: Spidey runs into Rocket and Groot while they track down Blackjack, the duo's furriest foe. Our spider-hero reminds a frustrated Rocket that, even in the heat of the chase, yelling is never the best way to get things done.

episodes.name: Not So Dry Cleaners
episodes.overview: Spidey is recruited by Doctor Strange, who needs some help turning sorcerer-spring-cleaning into fun. Of course, the most difficult chore is convincing the Cloak of Levitation to take a bath.

episodes.name: From Hulk to Eternity
episodes.overview: She-Hulk accidentally smashes Hulk's sandcastle on their day off at the beach, making Hulk angry. Our heroes are reminded that, even when you're not fighting crime, paying attention is important.

episodes.name: Sticky Rain
episodes.overview: Spidey, Miles Morales, and the citizens of New York must band together to show the hideous Hobgoblin that keeping the community clean and safe is everyone's responsibility.

episodes.name: Things That Go HaHa! In the Night
Charge Ahead
episodes.overview: Spidey swings into his arc-powered pal, Ironheart, as the city loses electricity! With Ironheart's suit shorting out, these amazing friends find a creative solution together.

episodes.name: Aww... Do I Have To?
episodes.overview: When Hulk has his super-strength stolen by the magical Morgan Le Fay, he and Spidey are forced to think outside-the-box and remember that an open mind is a great tool!

episodes.name: It's On Me
episodes.overview: Spidey and Captain America learn a thing or two about responsibility when Cap decides to leave his new Victory Bike unlocked, only for it to get hijacked.

episodes.name: Promises Promises
episodes.overview: After Mr. Fantastic and Spidey are visited by Mittens, Spidey promises to put him outside. When he doesn't keep his promise, it's catastrophic kitten chaos!

episodes.name: Outside The Box
episodes.overview: Diamonds are being stolen one-by-one from the jewelry store, so Spidey partners up with The Invisible Woman, aka Sue Storm, to solve the mystery! Who could it BEE?

episodes.name: It's Clobberin' Time
episodes.overview: During an attack by The Trapster, Spidey and The Thing get glued to each other. But before Thing clobbers himself for making a mistake, Spidey Reminds him to take a deep breath and remember that super heroes clobber crime, not themselves.

episodes.name: It's Too Darn Hot
episodes.overview: Spidey and the Human Torch team up to take down Sandman, who's snatching people's stuff at the beach. But when Torch spends too much time showing off, Sandman escapes and our heroes learn that too much of a good thing can be a bad thing.

episodes.name: One For All and All 4 One
episodes.overview: Faced with an especially challenging power-absorbing super villain, the Fantastic Four forgets how to work as a team. Good thing Spidey's there to remind them why there are the world's most fantastic family.

episodes.name: Building Bridges
episodes.overview: Captain Marvel and Spidey's relaxing day at the park is ruined by one of Rhino's rampages. But for Captain Marvel, every problem - no matter how big - has a super hero solution.

episodes.name: Obstacle, Of Course
episodes.overview: Spidey arrives in Wakanda for Black Panther's birthday party which turns out to be a very dangerous obstacle course set up by Black Panther's sister, Shuri. The royal siblings are always competitive but they may have gone a little too far.
